alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 1:59PM PST until February 22 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 14 inches, except 10 to 20 inches above 2500 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...From Monday evening through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of blowing and falling snow may create blizzard like conditions with limited visibility. Visibility less than one quarter mile possible along the peaks and westerly exposed terrain.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
